title: Stargate Atlantis
overview: The story of Stargate Atlantis follows the cliffhanger episode on Stargate SG-1's seventh season finale "Lost City", where SG-1 found an outpost made by the race known as the Ancients in Antarctica. After the events of Stargate SG-1 season eight premiere "New Order", the Stargate Command sends an international team to investigate the outpost. Soon, Dr. Daniel Jackson discovers the location of the greatest city created by the Ancients, Atlantis. The story unfolds when the members of the expedition encounter the Wraith, the race that defeated the Ancients ten thousand years ago.

episodes.title: Search and Rescue (2)
episodes.overview: After a conflict with Michael leaves several Atlantis personnel trapped, Colonel Carter leads a rescue mission.

episodes.title: The Seed
episodes.overview: When an alien organism incapacitates Dr. Keller, the team seeks help from an old friend recently revived from stasis.

episodes.title: Broken Ties
episodes.overview: Ronon once again comes face-to-face with Tyre, one of his people who became a Wraith worshiper -- but who now claims he has broken free of their influence.

episodes.title: The Daedalus Variations
episodes.overview: The team boards the Daedalus when it shows up abandoned in orbit, only to find themselves skipping through parallel universes.

episodes.title: Ghost in the Machine
episodes.overview: The city of Atlantis becomes host to the minds of disembodied Replicators, led by someone very close to the team.

episodes.title: The Shrine
episodes.overview: Rodney McKay is stricken with a mental affliction that robs him of his knowledge and memories, causing him to revert to a childlike state.

episodes.title: Whispers
episodes.overview: Sheppard and Beckett join a team investigating a hidden Wraith laboratory where Michael has been conducting genetic experiments.

episodes.title: The Queen
episodes.overview: Teyla goes in disguise as a Wraith queen when Todd agrees to make a bold proposal to the leader of his alliance -- not realizing that he has other intentions.

episodes.title: Tracker
episodes.overview: Ronon and McKay join Dr. Keller on an off-world errand of mercy, and must track her through the forest when a Runner kidnaps her.

episodes.title: First Contact (1)
episodes.overview: When Daniel Jackson visits Atlantis, he and Dr. McKay discover a hidden lab that brings a new enemy knocking. The Daedalus welcomes a Wraith ally for a special project.

episodes.title: The Lost Tribe (2)
episodes.overview: Sheppard races to an Ancient laboratory to save McKay and Daniel Jackson before Todd arrives to destroy a weapon that has a devastating side-effect. Daniel uncovers the identity of the hostile new species.

episodes.title: Outsiders
episodes.overview: The Wraith arrive in a village where Dr. Beckett is working, and demand that the locals turn over a group of refugees who survived the Hoffan plague -- or the entire village will be obliterated.

episodes.title: Inquisition
episodes.overview: A new coalition of human worlds puts the Atlantis team on trial for their alleged crimes against the Pegasus Galaxy.

episodes.title: The Prodigal
episodes.overview: The team fights to retake control of Atlantis when Michael infiltrates the control room to take Teyla's child and destroy the city.

episodes.title: Remnants
episodes.overview: While being evaluated by the I.O.A. Richard Woolsey meets a beautiful scientist new to Atlantis, who is not what she appears. Sheppard is captured and tortured by an enemy he thought was dead.

episodes.title: Brain Storm
episodes.overview: Rodney returns to Earth with Jennifer to witness the triumph of his rival, who believes he has solved the problem of global warming. But when the new technology goes horribly awry, Rodney must help shut down the deadly weather device.

episodes.title: Infection
episodes.overview: After Todd's hive ship shows up over Atlantis transmitting a distress call, the team discovers that he and his crew have been stricken with a disease they helped create.

episodes.title: Identity
episodes.overview: Dr. Keller's body is taken over by a cunning thief, while Keller finds herself imprisoned with a death sentence on another planet.

episodes.title: Vegas
episodes.overview: In the city of Las Vegas, Detective John Sheppard must solve the case on a long string of unusual murders -- perpetrated by a Wraith in hiding.

episodes.title: Enemy at the Gate
episodes.overview: The team learns that a rogue Wraith has acquired several Z.P.M.s to power a formidable new hive ship -- and he is headed for Earth.

episodes.title: Adrift (2)
episodes.overview: Floating in deep space with the city's protective shield failing, the team must do all they can to keep Atlantis alive. A radical injury threatens Dr. Weir's life.

episodes.title: Lifeline (3)
episodes.overview: Colonel Sheppard and his team embark on a risky mission to steal a Z.P.M. power module from the Replicators -- but must rely on a compromised Dr. Weir to succeed.

episodes.title: Reunion
episodes.overview: When a group of Ronon's people enlist the team's help in raiding a Wraith weapons facility, Ronon reconsiders whether his future lies in Atlantis or with his friends.

episodes.title: Doppelganger
episodes.overview: During an off-world mission Colonel Sheppard unknowingly becomes host to an alien entity, which infects others in Atlantis and afflicts them with terrifying nightmares.

episodes.title: Travelers
episodes.overview: Colonel Sheppard is captured by the inhabitants of a generational ship and their beautiful leader, who wish to use his ability to use Ancient technology for their own ends.

episodes.title: Tabula Rasa
episodes.overview: When a virus causes amnesia in everyone except Teyla and Ronon, the Atlantis team must work together to find a cure before their memories fade entirely.

episodes.title: Missing
episodes.overview: During a visit to New Athos, Teyla and Dr. Keller find themselves on the run from a primitive tribe of warriors.

episodes.title: The Seer
episodes.overview: The team meets a man with extraordinary prophetic abilities, who gives them a dark prediction about Atlantis's future. The Wraith seek a new alliance with Atlantis in their war with the Replicators.

episodes.title: Miller's Crossing
episodes.overview: Rodney McKay goes in search of his sister on Earth after she is kidnapped by the head of a powerful corporation.

episodes.title: This Mortal Coil (1)
episodes.overview: A mysterious drone crashes into Atlantis, indicating that the Replicators may have found the city. But when Elizabeth Weir appears, the team realizes that the probe is just a part of a bigger mystery.

episodes.title: Be All My Sins Remember'd (2)
episodes.overview: With a plan to potentially extinguish the Replicator threat, the Atlantis team must seek an alliance with a fleet of Wraith ships.

episodes.title: Spoils of War
episodes.overview: The team finds their former Wraith ally's hive ship drifting in space, which leads them to a secret project that could turn the tide of a civil war.

episodes.title: Quarantine
episodes.overview: An automated lockdown traps Atlantis personnel in various parts of the city, each of them hoping the others will come to their rescue.

episodes.title: Harmony
episodes.overview: Colonel Sheppard and Dr. McKay must protect a child princess on a pilgrimage before she can become queen, and learn that she has dangerous enemies threatening her life.

episodes.title: Outcast
episodes.overview: While on personal leave on Earth, Sheppard and Ronon learn that scientists have engineered a human-form Replicator -- who is now on the loose.

episodes.title: Trio
episodes.overview: McKay, Carter, and Keller are trapped in an underground chamber while on an off-world mission, with no apparent means of escape.

episodes.title: Midway
episodes.overview: Teal'c visits Atlantis to counsel a headstrong Ronon, who is up for review by the I.O.A. But the two must work together when the Wraith invade the Midway space station in order to reach Earth.

episodes.title: The Kindred (1)
episodes.overview: As a mysterious new illness sweeps through the Pegasus Galaxy, Teyla is convinced by a vision that the father of her child is trying to communicate with her.

episodes.title: The Kindred (2)
episodes.overview: The team is shocked when an old friend, believed to be dead, miraculously returns to them. Teyla plans an escape from Michael's captivity.

episodes.title: The Last Man (1)
episodes.overview: Sheppard returns to Atlantis after a mission and finds the city abandoned, all systems dead -- and instead of ocean, sand dunes as far as the eye can see.

episodes.title: No Man's Land (2)
episodes.overview: The team desperately attempts to stop two Wraith hive ships from reaching Earth. Sheppard must rely on an old foe to rescue McKay and Ronon.

episodes.title: Misbegotten (3)
episodes.overview: The Atlantis team must decide the fate of a colony of Wraith they have turned into humans. Dr. Weir must defend her leadership when she is evaluated by the I.O.A.

episodes.title: Irresistible
episodes.overview: Sheppard's team meets an obnoxious man who is adored by all thanks to a secret that he carries -- and who has an unexpected affect on them.

episodes.title: Sateda
episodes.overview: Ronon Dex is captured by the Wraith and returned to his homeworld, where he is haunted by his past as he is forced to once again become their prey.

episodes.title: Progeny
episodes.overview: Weir and the team visit an advanced civilization that split off from the Lanteans thousands of years ago, but discover that they may not have left Atlantis in peace.

episodes.title: The Real World
episodes.overview: Elizabeth Weir wakes up in a mental institution, where she is told that the expedition to Atlantis and the Stargate are figments of her imagination.

episodes.title: Common Ground
episodes.overview: Colonel Sheppard finds himself the prisoner of a Genii commander, along with a desperately hungry Wraith who has been separated from his hive.

episodes.title: McKay and Mrs. Miller
episodes.overview: Rodney McKay is reunited with his estranged sister back on Earth, who has given up a brilliant career as a scientist to raise a family.

episodes.title: Phantoms
episodes.overview: Sheppard and Ronon are influenced by a mind-altering device created by the Wraith while on a mission to rescue a lost team.

episodes.title: The Return (1)
episodes.overview: The Atlantis expedition is stunned to learn that a ship full of Ancients is returning to reclaim their lost city.

episodes.title: The Return (2)
episodes.overview: The Atlantis team goes against orders to try and save Atlantis from Replicator control -- and to rescue General O'Neill and Richard Woolsey, who are trapped in the occupied city.

episodes.title: Echoes
episodes.overview: The inhabitants of Atlantis begin to suffer ill effects when the planet's whale population begins migrating to the island city, bringing an unexpected harbinger of doom.

episodes.title: Irresponsible
episodes.overview: The team finds Lucius Lavin manipulating the people of another hapless planet, using Ancient technology to pose as an invincible hero.

episodes.title: Tao of Rodney
episodes.overview: After an Ancient device gives Rodney superhuman powers, his enhanced brilliance is checked only by his impending death -- unless he can learn how to ascend.

episodes.title: The Game
episodes.overview: Sheppard and McKay discover that their competitive video game has been controlling a planet of real people, who now stand on the brink of war.

episodes.title: The Ark
episodes.overview: The team discovers the last of a civilization in suspended animation, whose survival is at risk when their station is critically damaged.

episodes.title: Sunday
episodes.overview: The team tries to relax during a mandatory day off, until an explosion leaves three people dead -- and reveals that one scientist is a walking time bomb.

episodes.title: Submersion
episodes.overview: The team discovers an Ancient drilling station deep beneath the surface of the ocean, only to find that a Wraith queen is still alive there.

episodes.title: Vengeance
episodes.overview: The Atlantis team investigates the disappearance of one of their allies, only to find an old enemy engineering a race of powerful monsters.

episodes.title: First Strike (1)
episodes.overview: An unstoppable energy weapon leaves Atlantis under seige after Earth launches a preemptive attack against a very powerful enemy's homeworld.

episodes.title: The Siege (3)
episodes.overview: The Daedalus arrives to defend Atlantis from the Wraith onslaught, but it may not be enough when the team discovers that an even larger armada is on the way.

episodes.title: The Intruder
episodes.overview: The Daedalus is infected by a Wraith computer virus, while members of the expedition hope to return to Earth.

episodes.title: Runner
episodes.overview: Sheppard and his team attempt to locate Lieutenant Ford, only to find themselves captives of a former soldier who is being hunted by the Wraith.

episodes.title: Duet
episodes.overview: A run-in with a Wraith Dart leaves the consciousness of a precocious Atlantis security officer trapped in Dr. McKay's mind.

episodes.title: Condemned
episodes.overview: The Atlantis team finds a culture that lives in relative safety from the Wraith, because they hand over their criminals to the Wraith -- and crash-land in the volatile penal colony.

episodes.title: Trinity
episodes.overview: McKay puts the team at risk when he tries to perfect unfinished Ancient technology that wiped out a civilization. Ronon Dex discovers that he is not the lone survivor from his world.

episodes.title: Instinct
episodes.overview: The team discovers a young Wraith girl who has been raised by a human, and is in hiding from the people of her human village in fear of her life.

episodes.title: Conversion
episodes.overview: Colonel Sheppard begins to undergo a disturbing physical transformation after being exposed to Beckett's anti-Wraith drug.

episodes.title: Aurora
episodes.overview: When the team finds an Ancient warship adrift on the edge of the galaxy, its crew still alive, Colonel Sheppard enters their virtual reality stasis to communicate with them.

episodes.title: The Lost Boys (1)
episodes.overview: The team is captured by the missing Lieutenant Ford, who is now leading a group of young men who are taking the Wraith enzyme -- and who wants the team's help in a suicide attack against a hive ship.

episodes.title: The Hive (2)
episodes.overview: Colonel Sheppard and his team find themselves prisoners of the Wraith following Ford's attack on a hive ship. Dr. McKay goes to great lengths to help them.

episodes.title: Epiphany
episodes.overview: Sheppard finds himself on a planet where time passes more rapidly, with no way to contact his team or return to Atlantis.

episodes.title: Critical Mass
episodes.overview: When an operative of the Trust plants a bomb in Atlantis, the team must find a spy within their own ranks before the Wraith arrive and discover the city.

episodes.title: Grace Under Pressure
episodes.overview: When Dr. McKay is trapped underwater in a sinking Puddle Jumper, his only chance for survival may be an hallucination of Samantha Carter.

episodes.title: The Tower
episodes.overview: The team finds a world that possesses Ancient defense technology, where Colonel Sheppard finds himself a pawn in the rivalry between the heirs to the throne.

episodes.title: The Long Goodbye
episodes.overview: The team discovers two pods that contain the minds of alien beings, who take control of Weir and Sheppard's bodies to continue their personal war.

episodes.title: Coup D'Etat
episodes.overview: After a team from Atlantis goes missing, the expedition finds itself in the middle of a Genii coup.

episodes.title: Michael
episodes.overview: An amnesiac young Lieutenant in Atlantis suffers from disturbing nightmares that he is a Wraith, only to make a shocking discovery about himself.

episodes.title: Inferno
episodes.overview: Sheppard's team meets a civilization about to be destroyed by a super-volcano, and is trapped there when the Stargate is destroyed during the evacuation.

episodes.title: Allies (1)
episodes.overview: Michael and his Wraith faction arrive at Atlantis to propose an alliance, hoping to use the retrovirus to transform their Wraith enemies into prey.

episodes.title: Rising (1)
episodes.overview: A new Stargate team embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy, where they discover a mythical lost city -- and a deadly new enemy.

episodes.title: Rising (2)
episodes.overview: Sheppard tries to convince Weir to mount a rescue mission to free Colonel Sumner, Teyla, and the others captured by the Wraith.

episodes.title: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: The Atlantis base is threatened when the team discovers that an alien entity is in the city. McKay's experiment with alien technology goes awry.

episodes.title: Thirty-Eight Minutes
episodes.overview: The team finds themselves in mortal danger when their Puddle Jumper ship becomes lodged in the Stargate.

episodes.title: Suspicion
episodes.overview: After a series of run-ins with the Wraith, the team begins to suspect their Athosian allies of having a spy in their midst.

episodes.title: Childhood's End
episodes.overview: Sheppard and the team visit a world where no one is over 24 years old -- because of a ritual suicide practice they believe keeps the Wraith at bay.

episodes.title: Poisoning the Well
episodes.overview: The team finds a world whose people are on the brink of a discovery that may make them immune to the Wraith feeding.

episodes.title: Underground
episodes.overview: Efforts to open trade relations with a species called the Genii turn sour when the team discovers their new "allies" have ulterior motives.

episodes.title: Home
episodes.overview: McKay's efforts to harness the energy of an alien planet's atmosphere allows for a return trip to Earth -- but the team may not be able to return to Atlantis.

episodes.title: The Storm (1)
episodes.overview: When a massive storm threatens the city, Atlantis is evacuated -- only to be taken over by the team's newest enemy.

episodes.title: The Eye (2)
episodes.overview: Major Sheppard plays a dangerous game of cat and mouse with soldiers who have seized control of Atlantis and taken Weir and McKay hostage.

episodes.title: The Defiant One
episodes.overview: Sheppard's team investigates a downed Wraith ship, and find themselves stuck on a planet with a lone Wraith survivor.

episodes.title: Hot Zone
episodes.overview: Nearly a third of Atlantis's residents are infected with a deadly virus that causes hallucinations and death, forcing a lockdown of the city.

episodes.title: Sanctuary
episodes.overview: The team finds a paradise world that would make an ideal sanctuary for those fleeing from the Wraith, but the local inhabitants believe their goddess will not permit it.

episodes.title: Before I Sleep
episodes.overview: A woman is found in suspended animation in Atlantis, and the team is shocked to see that it is Dr. Weir herself, who tells them of her trip 10,000 years into the city's past.

episodes.title: The Brotherhood
episodes.overview: The team searches for a valuable Zero Point Module rumored to be hidden on the planet Dagan -- but their new allies have motives of their own.

episodes.title: Letters from Pegasus
episodes.overview: With a brief opportunity to send a data transmission to Earth, members of the Atlantis expedition compose video messages home to their loved ones.

episodes.title: The Gift
episodes.overview: Plagued by terrifying nightmares, Teyla begins to recall a time when she and her father were captured by the Wraith and subjected to disturbing experiments.

episodes.title: The Siege (1)
episodes.overview: With a group of Wraith hive ships on the way to Atlantis, the team searches for a place to flee and a way to destroy the city. McKay leads a team to try and activate the Ancients' orbital weapons platform.

episodes.title: The Siege (2)
episodes.overview: A new military contingent from Earth is sent to take command of Atlantis and defend it from the impending Wraith attack.

episodes.title: Preview to Stargate Atlantis
episodes.overview: Preview to the new stargate series called Stargate Atlantis. Includes cast interviews and behind the scene footage.

episodes.title: From Stargate to Atlantis: Sci Fi Lowdown
